# Testing Checklist: [Feature Name]

**Feature**: 
**Date**: 
**Tester**: 

## Unit Tests

### Backend
- [ ] Model tests
- [ ] Service tests
- [ ] Repository tests
- [ ] Validation tests

### Frontend
- [ ] Component render tests
- [ ] Hook tests
- [ ] Utility function tests

## Integration Tests

- [ ] API endpoint tests
- [ ] Database interaction tests
- [ ] External service mocks

## E2E Tests

- [ ] Happy path flow
- [ ] Error handling flow
- [ ] Edge cases

## Manual Testing

- [ ] Functionality works as expected
- [ ] UI matches design
- [ ] Responsive on mobile
- [ ] Accessible (keyboard, screen reader)
- [ ] Cross-browser tested

## Coverage

| Type | Target | Actual |
|------|--------|--------|
| Unit | 80% | |
| Integration | 70% | |
| Overall | 80% | |

## Sign-off

- [ ] All tests pass
- [ ] Coverage meets targets
- [ ] No regressions
- [ ] Ready for merge
